Reviews.Content: pricequality ratio stayed saba hotel week chilly november location perfect sightseeing trams shopping saba neatly route sultanahmet crowds nearby supermarket laundry internet cafe restaurants normal life plus fabulous sights basic clean hot water heating aircon rooftop breakfast hall breathtaking views marmara blue mosque aya sofia compensate hasslefree shuttle service ataturk airport enjoyed friendly service reception cafeteria roof top suite staff helpful active contributed turkish skills smile

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Saba Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: CalgaryBassett
Reviews.Content: recently returned routed twice istanbul times stayed hotel saba husbands fourth time location excellent close visit helpful lucky clean comfortable beds wonderful especially clean breakfast especially overlooking blue mosque stay return istanbul spring thank kindness putting delightful luck future

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Mesut A
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel saba afternoon booked scene terrace perfect hotel staff friendly polite enjoyed stay happy found ourselves nice centre cityit simple nice

Reviews.Title: “Good location (nice terrace view), good breakfast....no frills room with horrible service,”

Reviews.Content: ok pros cons cons service horrendous am picky dont am comes service booked 2 double 4 beds total 6 months arrival told wed double single werent sorry didnt offer refund difference price werent nice single twin bed towel blanket meant 1 didnt restock night extra dont speak english takes time understand simple towels beds blanket werent staff id rate average id reccomend calling advance settled excuse booking computer booked misrepresented available electronically beware single tiny hardly unpack carry luggage morning 500am prayer loud close mosque suppose thats pros view terrace ayasofya blue mosque nicely water istanbul view night nice drink bed location close sultanahmet tram stop t1 line breakfast pretty lots choice lots cheeses feta mozzerella salty eggs hams cucumber dough filled cheese pastries tomato cereal toast coffee tea kinda lacking

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good service”

Reviews.Content: stayed clean albeit single biggest selling hotel absolute premium location 50 metres 100 metres blue mosque 300 metres aya sophia despite location hotel quiet staff friendly eager help youd downside id bed hard overall simple hotel

Reviews.Title: “Central location with very helpful and friendly staff”

Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location staff friendly able assist 6 son time patient triple isnt clean served purpose view roof terrace fabulous perfect central location2 minutes major sites 10 mins grand stay return

Reviews.Content: saba run hotel reasonable rates loved staff wonderful stay particular desk jewel helped organize trips sightseeing lovely generous host clean comfortable bed softer bit hard view breakfast terrace unbeatable time

emailing flight times pick â€“ faxed details hotel week received email reply airport meet fight provide complimentary transfer included booking 7 nights telephoned hotel wait found happening boat trip eminonu boats ferries walk 2 stops tram half hour boat trip bosphorus 10 tl â€“ thats 5 euros â€“ bit difference enjoyable trip morning offer overlooking street fine balcony view clean fresh cold chips french fries cold hard boiled eggs ok day eggs cooked properly cold runny eggs revolting inedible hotel web page wireless internet free internet access via pc lobby true wireless internet Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable hotel near major attractions with questionable customer service.”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed saba hotel nights nice budget hotel quiet street close major attractions sultanahmet public transportation clean bathroom shower nice wifi internet access available lobby breakfasts plenty options available typical turkish breakfast loved view blue mosque breakfast terrace short stunning booked hotel nights directly hotels own website booked nights discount rate free pickup airport requested pickup filled flight information airport pick waiting hour driver hotel called saba hotel arranged spoke woman front desk via cell phone assured realized responsibility driver told charge checked hotel charge pickup claimed spite filled flight information reservation page supposed sent email information arguing hour finally agreed charge recommendation send flight information email receive written confirmation picking hotel reservation confirmation saying free airport pickup apparently sufficient complaint staff sell tourist package deals helping answer questions wonderful stay caveats recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: wife arrived saba hoter 60th birthday stayed hotel staff lovely helpful hand sort 204 clean maids hard breakfast expect typical turkish nice eat view breakfast terrace blow hotel street near main sites thank hotel saba staff trip istanbul remember
